name: budget-tracker
description: Budget Tracker Application with FastAPI backend and React frontend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.setup: npm run install-frontend && cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
